web.regions.data_sovereignty_description.en: Your data resides exclusively in your chosen region and is never transferred across regions
web.regions.data_sovereignty_description.translation: Vaši podatki se nahajajo izključno v vaši izbrani regiji in se nikoli ne prenašajo preko regij

web.regions.separate_environments_explan.en: Each region operates as a completely independent environment with its own infrastructure, encryption keys, and data storage
web.regions.separate_environments_explan.translation: Vsaka regija deluje kot popolnoma neodvisno okolje z lastno infrastrukturo, šifrirnimi ključi in shranjevanjem podatkov

web.regions.no_data_transfer_policy.en: We maintain a strict policy: customer data is never transferred between regions under any circumstances
web.regions.no_data_transfer_policy.translation: Vzdrževamo strogo politiko: podatki strank se nikoli ne prenašajo med regijami pod nobenim pogojem

web.regions.switching_creates_new_accoun.en: Important: Switching to a different region creates a new account. Your data stays in your original region.
web.regions.switching_creates_new_accoun.translation: Pomembno: Preklop v drugo regijo ustvari nov račun. Vaši podatki ostanejo v vaši izvirni regiji.

web.regions.trust_description.en: Know exactly where your data resides and which laws govern its protection.
web.regions.trust_description.translation: Veste točno, kje se nahajajo vaši podatki in katere zakone urejajo njihovo zaščito.

web.regions.privacy_description.en: Ensure your personal information is handled according to your country's privacy laws and regulations, preventing unauthorized access or misuse.
web.regions.privacy_description.translation: Zagotovite, da se vaše osebne informacije obravnavajo v skladu z zakoni o zasebnosti vaše države in predpisi, kar preprečuje nepooblaščen dostop ali zlorabo.

web.regions.compliance_description.en: Meet GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA, and other regional data protection requirements
web.regions.compliance_description.translation: Izpolnite zahteve GDPR, HIPAA, CCPA in druge regionalne zahteve za zaščito podatkov

web.regions.performance_description.en: Data stored closer to you means lower latency and better performance.
web.regions.performance_description.translation: Podatki, shranjeni bliže vam, pomenijo nižjo zakasnitev in boljšo zmogljivost.

web.regions.your_account_and_data_are_pr.en: Your account and data are protected under the laws of
web.regions.your_account_and_data_are_pr.translation: Vaš račun in podatki so zaščiteni pod zakoni

web.regions.this_regulatory_framework_is.en: Your regulatory framework is determined by your access domain:
web.regions.this_regulatory_framework_is.translation: Vaš regulativni okvir je določen z vašo domeno dostopa:

web.regions.each_jurisdiction_maintains_.en: Each region is completely separate with its own infrastructure, when possible with its own local hosting provider. You can create accounts in multiple regions, but no data is shared between them.
web.regions.each_jurisdiction_maintains_.translation: Vsaka regija je popolnoma ločena z lastno infrastrukturo, ko je mogoče z lastnim lokalnim ponudnikom gostovanja. Račune lahko ustvarite v več regijah, vendar se med njimi podatki ne delijo.

web.regions.to_understand_the_specific_r.en: For details on regulations and protections that apply to your account,
web.regions.to_understand_the_specific_r.translation: Za podrobnosti o predpisih in zaščitah, ki veljajo za vaš račun,
